sqlMap.select: select e.eva_id, e.customer_id, e.eva_salemanager, e.eva_salegen, e.eva_finmanager, e.comment, esm.enumeration_name as evaSalemanagerName, esg.enumeration_name as evaSalegenName, efm.enumeration_name as evaFinmanagerName from s_customer_fin_evaluation e left join s_enumeration esm on e.eva_salemanager = esm.enumeration_id left join s_enumeration esg on e.eva_salegen = esg.enumeration_id left join s_enumeration efm on e.eva_finmanager = efm.enumeration_id where e.eva_id = #evaId:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert: insert into s_customer_fin_evaluation (eva_id, customer_id, eva_salemanager, eva_salegen, eva_finmanager, comment) values (#evaId:INTEGER#, #customerId:INTEGER#, #evaSalemanager:INTEGER#, #evaSalegen:INTEGER#, #evaFinmanager:INTEGER#, #comment:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update s_customer_fin_evaluation set customer_id = #customerId:INTEGER#, eva_salemanager = #evaSalemanager:INTEGER#, eva_salegen = #evaSalegen:INTEGER#, eva_finmanager = #evaFinmanager:INTEGER#, comment = #comment:VARCHAR# where eva_id = #evaId:INTEGER#

update s_customer_fin_evaluation
customer_id = #customerId:INTEGER#
eva_salemanager = #evaSalemanager:INTEGER#
eva_salegen = #evaSalegen:INTEGER#
eva_finmanager = #evaFinmanager:INTEGER#
comment = #comment:VARCHAR#
where eva_id = #evaId:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select e.eva_id, e.customer_id, e.eva_salemanager, e.eva_salegen, e.eva_finmanager, e.comment, esm.enumeration_name as evaSalemanagerName, esg.enumeration_name as evaSalegenName, efm.enumeration_name as evaFinmanagerName from s_customer_fin_evaluation e left join s_enumeration esm on e.eva_salemanager = esm.enumeration_id left join s_enumeration esg on e.eva_salegen = esg.enumeration_id left join s_enumeration efm on e.eva_finmanager = efm.enumeration_id where e.customer_id = #customerId:INTEGER#
